page.title: 03 OUR SCHOOL
page.content: In our school we have two playgrounds, the Infants and Juniors and we also have a football pitch.There are two blocks of buildings,in the bottom block there are three class rooms and a big dinner hall.There are girls and boys toilets and changing rooms.In the art room, we also watch T.V and the video.We have a big librey and two bike sheds. At the back of the hall are the school kitchens,this is where they serve our dinners at 12.10.Some of us take sandwiches or go home for dinner.This is a average meal. Curry and rice. Fish_cake Peas or Salad and Potatoes.We have a garden full of flowers trees and a pond. In the top building there are two class rooms and class room attatched to the swimming pool.The swimming pool is about 10 metres long and 6 wide.
